form.SN:
v ameriški angleščini pišemo
quarreling, quarreled
.

sense.def:
A quarrel
je jezno razpravljanje med dvema ali več ljudmi.

seg.quote: I don't think we should enter into a family quarrel.
There wasn't any evidence of quarrels between them.

sense.def:
Kadar dva ali več ljudi
quarrel
, se jezno pogovarjajo.

seg.quote: I don't want to quarrel with you.

sense.def:
To have no quarrel with something
pomeni, da tistemu ne nasprotujemo.

seg.quote: I wouldn't have any quarrel with this proposal myself.
